problem.markdown: 1.Which of the following is the correct output expression for an 4x1 MUX? [Given D0, D1, D2, D3 are the data inputs and S0, S1 are the select inputs]. ( ) Y = D0*D1*S0 + D2*D3*S1 (x) Y = D0*S1'*S0' + D1*S1'*S0 + D2*S1*S0' + D3*S1*S0 ( ) Y = D0*S0' + D1*S1' + D2*S0 + D3*S1 ( ) Y = D0*D1*S0 + D2*D3*S1 + D0'*D1'*S0 + D2'*D3'*S1
problem.p: 1.Which of the following is the correct output expression for an 4x1 MUX? [Given D0, D1, D2, D3 are the data inputs and S0, S1 are the select inputs].
